sentences.sContent: Safety, little scathe on the fabric strength.
sentences.sContent_eng: Safety, little scathe on the fabric strength.
sentences.sCn: 使用安全，对织物强度的损伤极小。

sentences.sContent: Results: The general medical conditions mostly were skin parenchyma scathe , infection disease, malnutrition and fracture and so on.
sentences.sContent_eng: Results: The general medical conditions mostly were skin parenchyma scathe , infection disease, malnutrition and fracture and so on.
sentences.sCn: 结果：躯体疾病以皮肤软组织损伤、感染性疾病、营养不良、传染病、骨折等占前几位。

sentences.sContent: Flood control decision supporting system is a non-project measure that can efficiently lessen the scathe of flood disaster and reduce the damage of flood, it is become more and more important .
sentences.sContent_eng: Flood control decision supporting system is a non-project measure that can efficiently lessen the scathe of flood disaster and reduce the damage of flood, it is become more and more important .
sentences.sCn: 防洪决策支持系统作为有效减轻洪灾的危害程度、降低损失的非工程措施，在现代的防洪减灾工作中发挥着越来越重要的作用。
